item.title: Airbnb's Coolest Tiny Houses in America
item.description:
Airbnb's Coolest Tiny Houses in America

Tiny homes are all the rage, so it makes perfect sense that tiny homes people list on Airbnb are also quite popular. And that's…

item.title: A Guide To Great Coffee In Kichijoji, Tokyo - Sprudge
item.description:
A Guide To Great Coffee In Kichijoji, Tokyo - Sprudge

Spring in Japan is marked by the cherry blossom, when pink clouds of the blooming flower paint on a canvas of clear blue sky. It's a time to celebrate the beautiful transience of life, which the locals often do at picnics in the park-known as -under a gentle rain of falling petals.

item.title: Timbuk2 + Blue Bottle's Sabbatical Travel Kit
item.description:
Timbuk2 + Blue Bottle's Sabbatical Travel Kit

If the recent buyouts of Intelligentsia and Stumptown are any indication, the growing popularity of craft coffee shows no signs of slowing down. While single origin pour-overs are now commonplace in many coffeeshops, sometimes when you're off the beaten path, your morning cup of coffee is harder to perfect.

item.title: Photos of Various Food Dishes Flying Through the Air
item.description:
Photos of Various Food Dishes Flying Through the Air

Camden, London-based commercial still life photographer Piotr Gregorczyk likes to play with food and gravity. One concept he has focused on for a number of recent projects is the idea of showing various food dishes flying through the air as they come together on a plate or in a bowl.

item.title: Best of CH 2015: Instagram
item.description:
Best of CH 2015: Instagram

Four and a half years ago we joined Instagram and have posted over 2,500 images since. More than 99% of the photographs we share, we ourselves have taken, and that's something we're quite proud of.

item.title: Mido Eyewear Show 2016
item.description:
Mido Eyewear Show 2016

While you might not have heard of it, Italy's Mido Eyewear Show is the leading event for eyewear professionals. It's an exhibition during which major international brands present their new styles and innovations for prescription specs and sunglasses-and, while it might sound like it's purely for industry members, it's fascinating for anybody interested in fashion and design.
